languages.text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of every combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} rank)</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.{br}
///Iconoclast — Adherent -//
languages.original_text:
В первом раунде боя все в отряде Вольного Торговца получают +<u>(2 + ранг Благодеяния Вольного Торговца)</u> очка передвижения.{br}
<align="center"> ///Благодеяние — Сторонник -//

traits.locale_text:
In the first round of every combat the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's Benevolentia rank)</u> additional movement points.{br}
<align="center"> ///Benevolentia — Adherent -//

In the first round of every combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's Benevolentia rank)</u> additional MP.{br}
<align="center"> ///Benevolentia — Adherent -//

In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of every combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} rank)</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.{br}
///Iconoclast — Adherent -//

languages.text:
В первом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} боя все в отряде Вольного Торговца получают +<u>(2 + ранг {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматика{/g} Вольного Торговца)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очка передвижения{/g}.{br}
///Схизматик — сторонник -//

In der ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eines jeden Kampfes erhalten der Freihändler und seine Verbündeten +<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g}-Rang des Freihändlers)</u> zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.{br}
///Ikonoklast – Anhänger -//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of every combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} rank)</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.{br}
///Iconoclast — Adherent -//

traits.locale_text:
In der ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}Runde{/g} eines jeden Kampfes erhalten der Freihändler und seine Verbündeten +<u>(2 + Benevolentia-Rang des Freihändlers)</u> zusätzliche BP.{br}
///Benevolentia – Anhänger -//

languages.text:
Lors du premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de chaque combat, le Libre-Marchand et ses alliés bénéficient de +<u>(2 + rang {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} du Libre-Marchand)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} supplémentaires.{br}
///Iconoclaste — Partisan -//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of every combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} rank)</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.{br}
///Iconoclast — Adherent -//

traits.locale_text:
Lors du premier {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} de chaque combat, le Libre-Marchand et ses alliés bénéficient de +<u>(2 + rang Benevolentia du Libre-Marchand)</u> PD supplémentaires.{br}
///Benevolentia — Partisan -//

languages.text:
每场战斗的首{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，行商浪人与所有盟友获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}移动点数{/g}，等同于<u>（2+行商浪人的“信念：{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}自由主义{/g}”等级）</u>。{br}
///自由主义——拥护者 -//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of every combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} rank)</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.{br}
///Iconoclast — Adherent -//

traits.locale_text:
每场战斗的首{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}中，行商浪人与所有盟友获得额外移动点数，等同于<u>（2+行商浪人的“信念：人道主义”等级）</u>。{br}
///人道主义——拥护者 -//

languages.text:
Durante el primer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} de cada combate, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y sus aliados obtienen +<u>(2 + rango de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g} de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} adicionales.{br}
///Iconoclasta: Partidario -//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of every combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} rank)</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.{br}
///Iconoclast — Adherent -//

traits.locale_text:
Durante el primer {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}asalto{/g} de cada combate, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y sus aliados obtienen +<u>(2 + rango de Benevolentia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente)</u> PM adicionales.{br}
///Benevolentia: Partidario//

languages.text:
各戦闘の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で、ローグトレーダーとその味方は+<u>(2 + ローグトレーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g}ランク)</u>の追加{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を得る。{br}
///革新主義 ― 門下生-//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of every combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} rank)</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.{br}
///Iconoclast — Adherent -//

traits.locale_text:
各戦闘の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}ラウンド{/g}で、ローグトレーダーとその味方は+<u>(2 + ローグトレーダーのベネボレンティアランク)</u>の追加MPを得る。{br}
///ベネボレンティア ― 門下生-//
